Name: VR SHOOT AROUND - Realistic basketball simulator -
About the game: VR SHOOT AROUND is a 'Simulater of basketball shoot around' that will provide you fantastic physical calculations, fantastic sounds and a fantastic rich court. Do not worry if you are not good shooter. because this simulater has 'Throwing power assist' and 'G.O.A.T. assist', therefore you can hit a long shot like an NBA player! Let's release your frustration!!! About the operation status of OculusQuest (using OculusLink) Playing with OculusQuest via OculusLink (using Oculus-cable) has been confirmed to work, but playing with OculusQuest via VirtualDesktop is not recommended by Oculus and is not supported. (But there are also reports that it works) Game features 【 Realistic rim-net physics 】We developed a physics function to reproduce the movement of rim-net close to reality. 【 Throwing power multiplier 】You can change the magnification of the throwing power. In addition, detailed settings such as rotational force, angle, and height are also possible. 【 G.O.A.T. assist 】If set to maximum value of this function, your shot will succeed with 99.9% probability unless there is an obstacle. 【 Rim height 】You can change the height of the rim in three steps. (3.05m, 2.45m, 1.85m) 【 Court color painting 】You can change each space in the court to your favorite color. 【 Logo manager 】You can paste the selected image (PNG, JPG) from the local folder on the court. 【 Video screen 】You can play selected movie & sound file from the local folder on the screen. 【 Minigames 】You can play 3PTS CONTEST & NINE HOOPS now. Users guide HTC Vive 【 Trigger 】Click while using pointer 【 Trigger 】Grab a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 Grip 】Receive a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 Menu button 】Open settings window 【 Touchpad 】Touch : Pointer 【 Touchpad 】Press Up or Down : Move 【 Touchpad 】Press Left or Right : Rotate Oculus Rift & Oculus Quest 【 Trigger 】Click while using pointer 【 Trigger 】Grab a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 Grip 】Receive a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 B or Y button 】Open settings window 【 Thumbstick 】Touch : Pointer 【 Thumbstick 】Tilt Up or Down : Move 【 Thumbstick 】Tilt Left or Right : Rotate Valve Index 【 Trigger 】Click while using pointer 【 Trigger 】Grab a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 Grip 】Receive a ball (Switchable on KeyConfig) 【 B button 】Open settings window 【 Thumbstick 】Touch : Pointer 【 Thumbstick 】Tilt Up or Down : Move 【 Thumbstick 】Tilt Left or Right : Rotate Common operation 【 Click on video screen 】Open video screen controller.
